tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_activity_logs ( 
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    user_id INT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    activity_type VARCHAR, 
    activity_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE voice_recognition_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    recognition_accuracy FLOAT,
    recognition_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE VoiceRecognitionResults (
    result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT REFERENCES VoiceRecognitionSessions(session_id),
    recognition_type VARCHAR(255),
    recognition_accuracy FLOAT,
    recognized_text TEXT
);
